content: I'm not familiar with nullary intrinsics, but need to know whether the compiler would ever create a ConstAlloc for such a constant. Specifically in eval_to_const_value_raw we have a special case for nullary intrinsics and don't call eval_to_allocation_raw. Can anybody tell me whether we would ever call eval_to_allocation_raw on such keys in other circumstances ?
I don't think we ever call the raw query for nullary intrinsics. It would probably cause the compiler to panic afaik
